Name: Bench Press
Description: Press a barbell upward while lying on a flat bench.

Name: Incline Bench Press
Description: Press a barbell upward on an incline bench.

Name: Decline Bench Press
Description: Press a barbell upward on a decline bench.

Name: Dumbbell Bench Press
Description: Press dumbbells upward while lying on a bench.

Name: Incline Dumbbell Bench Press
Description: Press dumbbells upward while lying on an incline bench.

Name: Dumbbell Fly
Description: Open your arms wide and bring dumbbells together above your chest.

Name: Chest Dip
Description: Lower and raise your body on parallel bars leaning slightly forward.

Name: Push-Up
Description: Push your body up and down from the floor.

Name: Cable Chest Fly
Description: Pull cable handles together in front of your chest.

Name: Pec Deck Machine
Description: Bring padded arms together in a chest fly motion.

Name: Cable Crossover High
Description: Pull cables downward toward the centerline.

Name: Cable Crossover Low
Description: Pull cables upward toward the centerline.

Name: Squat
Description: Lower your hips and stand back up with weight on your shoulders.

Name: Front Squat
Description: Hold the barbell in front rack position and squat.

Name: Goblet Squat
Description: Squat while holding a dumbbell at chest level.

Name: Hack Squat
Description: Perform squats on a hack squat machine.

Name: Leg Press
Description: Push a weighted platform away using your legs.

Name: Walking Lunge
Description: Step forward into lunges while walking.

Name: Reverse Lunge
Description: Take a backward step into a lunge.

Name: Bulgarian Split Squat
Description: Squat on one leg with rear foot elevated.

Name: Step-Up
Description: Step onto a platform while holding weights.

Name: Deadlift
Description: Lift a barbell from the floor to hip level.

Name: Romanian Deadlift
Description: Lower barbell to mid-shin while keeping legs slightly bent.

Name: Sumo Deadlift
Description: Deadlift with a wide stance.

Name: Trap Bar Deadlift
Description: Lift using a trap bar with neutral grip.

Name: Good Morning
Description: Hinge at hips with barbell on your back.

Name: Back Extension
Description: Raise torso from a bent position on extension bench.

Name: Hip Thrust
Description: Lift hips upward with shoulders on a bench.

Name: Glute Bridge
Description: Lift hips upward from the floor.

Name: Cable Pull-Through
Description: Pull cable between legs using hip hinge.

Name: Leg Extension
Description: Extend legs against resistance on machine.

Name: Leg Curl Seated
Description: Curl legs while seated.

Name: Leg Curl Lying
Description: Curl legs while lying face down.

Name: Standing Calf Raise
Description: Raise heels while standing.

Name: Seated Calf Raise
Description: Raise heels while seated.

Name: Overhead Press
Description: Press barbell overhead while standing.

Name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
Description: Press dumbbells overhead while seated.

Name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
Description: Lift dumbbells outward to shoulder height.

Name: Front Raise
Description: Lift weight straight in front to shoulder height.

Name: Rear Delt Fly
Description: Raise dumbbells laterally while bent over.

Name: Machine Shoulder Press
Description: Press weight overhead on a machine.

Name: Upright Row
Description: Pull bar upward to chest level.

Name: Barbell Row
Description: Row barbell toward torso.

Name: Pendlay Row
Description: Row barbell explosively from floor.

Name: Dumbbell Row
Description: Row dumbbell toward torso with one arm.

Name: Lat Pulldown
Description: Pull bar down to chest.

Name: Wide-Grip Pulldown
Description: Pull wide-grip bar to chest.

Name: Close-Grip Pulldown
Description: Pull narrow-grip bar to chest.

Name: Seated Cable Row
Description: Pull cable handle toward torso.

Name: Chest-Supported Row
Description: Row weights while chest rests on bench.

Name: T-Bar Row
Description: Row a landmine bar toward torso.

Name: Pull-Up
Description: Pull body upward to bar.

Name: Chin-Up
Description: Pull body up with underhand grip.

Name: Inverted Row
Description: Pull chest toward bar while body is suspended.

Name: Face Pull
Description: Pull rope attachment toward face.

Name: Cable Row High
Description: Row cables from high angle.

Name: Cable Row Low
Description: Row cables from low angle.

Name: Biceps Curl
Description: Curl weights upward.

Name: Hammer Curl
Description: Curl dumbbells with neutral grip.

Name: Preacher Curl
Description: Curl weight on preacher bench.

Name: Cable Curl
Description: Curl cable handle upward.

Name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
Description: Curl dumbbells on an incline bench.

Name: Concentration Curl
Description: Curl dumbbell while seated with elbow on thigh.

Name: Tricep Pushdown
Description: Push cable bar downward.

Name: Overhead Tricep Extension
Description: Extend weight overhead.

Name: Skullcrusher
Description: Lower and extend barbell toward forehead.

Name: Cable Kickback
Description: Extend arm backward using cable.

Name: Dips (Triceps)
Description: Lower and push body on parallel bars upright.

Name: Rope Overhead Extension
Description: Extend rope overhead.

Name: Cable Lateral Raise
Description: Lift cable outward to shoulder height.

Name: Machine Fly Reverse
Description: Reverse fly motion on machine.

Name: Machine Chest Press
Description: Press weight forward on machine.

Name: Machine Row
Description: Pull weight on machine.

Name: Machine Leg Press Horizontal
Description: Push platform horizontally.

Name: Smith Machine Squat
Description: Perform squats using smith machine.

Name: Smith Machine Bench Press
Description: Press bar on smith machine.

Name: Smith Machine Row
Description: Row bar on smith machine.

Name: Cable Crunch
Description: Crunch downward using cable rope.

Name: Hanging Leg Raise
Description: Raise legs while hanging.

Name: Knee Raise
Description: Raise knees while hanging or supported.

Name: Plank

Name: Side Plank
Description: Hold body sideways supported on one elbow.

Name: Russian Twist
Description: Twist torso while holding weight.

Name: Cable Woodchop
Description: Pull cable diagonally across body.

Name: Ab Wheel Rollout
Description: Roll wheel forward and back.

Name: Crunch Machine
Description: Crunch forward on machine.

Name: Back Hyperextension Machine
Description: Extend torso upward on machine.

Name: Farmer's Walk

Name: Sled Push
Description: Push weighted sled forward.

Name: Sled Pull
Description: Pull weighted sled backward.

Name: Kettlebell Swing
Description: Swing kettlebell explosively.

Name: Kettlebell Clean
Description: Clean kettlebell to rack position.

Name: Kettlebell Snatch
Description: Snatch kettlebell overhead.

Name: Landmine Press
Description: Press barbell in landmine setup.

Name: Landmine Row
Description: Row landmine bar upward.

Name: Landmine Twist
Description: Twist torso while holding landmine bar.

Name: Hip Abduction Machine

Name: Hip Adduction Machine
Description: Move legs inward against resistance.

Name: Seated Row Machine

Name: Lat Machine Pull-Over
